Name: The Dark World: Edge of Eternity
About the game: DISCORD: The Dark World: The Edge of Eternity is a horror survival game. Players will fight for survival in the cruel dark world of Werewolves and Vampires, or can be one of them. Try to save your race from total extermination in Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode. Massive Open World Map Massive open world terrain located in the middle of Europe. Character Customization Advanced character customization for Guardian, Vampire and Werewolf. Vehicles Destructable ground, aerial and water vehicles, and also shooting from vehicles. Story Based Quests Story driven quests for every character and race. Missions Multi level mission system that will test your skills. Weather, Day/Night Cycle & Seasons Challenging advanced weather and seasons system. Advanced Combat System Close combat system with various weapon types. Advanced Crafting Multi level crafting system. Base Building 5 stage base building with over 20 different pieces. Pets & Mounts Various types of animals that can be used as pets or mounts.
